csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="; ">
	  <text variable="title" suffix=": "/>
      <choose>
        <if variable="locator">
          <text value="(1) Locator true"/>
        </if>
        <else>
          <text value="(1) Locator false"/>
        </else>
      </choose>
      <choose>
        <if variable="locator" match="none">
          <text value=" (2) Locator false"/>
        </if>
        <else>
          <text value=" (2) Locator true"/>
        </else>
      </choose>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
result: Book One: (1) Locator true (2) Locator true; Book Two: (1) Locator false (2) Locator false
